title: Arma 3 Free Updates and Editor Announced As Sales Hit 2 Million
text:
Arma 3 Free Updates and Editor Announced As Sales Hit 2 Million 
Published By: Gamespot.com - Today 
PC military shooter Arma III has now sold more than 2 million copies, developer Bohemia Interactive has announced. This is up from 1 million...
